DrugName: Pain relievers like acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin) to manage pain and inflammation.
Antibiotics like ampicillin/sulbactam (Unasyn) or ceftriaxone (Rocephin) to treat bacterial infection.
Anti-nausea medication like ondansetron (Zofran) to help control vomiting.
Antihistamines like diphenhydramine (Benadryl) to reduce inflammation and relieve pain.
Fluids and electrolytes to prevent dehydration and maintain proper electrolyte balance.
